#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        string user[n][2],name,vote;
        int i,j,found=0,k=0,count=0;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>name>>vote;
            found=0;
            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
            {
                if(user[j][0]==name)
                {
                    user[j][1]=vote;
                    found=1;
                }

            }
            if(found==0)
            {user[k][0]=name;
            user[k][1]=vote;
            k++;
            }
        }
        for(i=0;i<k;i++)
        {
            if(user[i][1]=="+")
            {
                count++;

            }
            else
            {
                count--;
            }
        }
        cout<<count<<"\n";
    }

}
